flavorText: The sphinxes began to speak only after the Second Sun aligned. They whispered dire warnings, though no one listened.

foreignData.flavorText: Die erste Sphinx begann zu sprechen, als die zweite Sonne bereits in Stellung war. Zu spät, als dass es noch jemand hätte hören können.
foreignData.name: Unheilvolle Sphinx
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn du eine Karte umwandelst oder abwirfst, erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, -2/-0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: Las esfinges empezaron a hablar solo cuando el Segundo Sol se alineó. Susurraron advertencias funestas, pero nadie escuchó.
foreignData.name: Esfinge ominosa
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que actives una habilidad de ciclo o descartes una carta, la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente obtiene -2/-0 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Les sphinx ne commencèrent à parler qu'après l'alignement du Second Soleil. Ils murmuraient de terribles avertissements, même si personne ne les écoutait.
foreignData.name: Sphinx comminatoire
foreignData.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que vous recyclez ou vous défaussez d'une carte, une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle gagne -2/-0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Le sfingi cominciarono a parlare solo dopo l'allineamento del Secondo Sole. Sussurravano cupi moniti, cui nessuno però prestava orecchio.
foreignData.name: Sfinge Minacciosa
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta cicli o scarti una carta, una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario prende -2/-0 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: スフィンクスたちが口を開いたのは副陽が並んだ後のことだった。彼らは警告を囁いたが、それに耳を傾ける者はいなかった。
foreignData.name: 不吉なスフィンクス
foreignData.text:
飛行
あなたがカードを１枚サイクリングするか捨てるたび、対戦相手がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－２/－０の修整を受ける。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スフィンクス

foreignData.flavorText: 스핑크스들은 두 번째 태양이 정렬되고서야 입을 열었다. 그들은 무시무시한 경고를 속삭였지만 아무도 듣지 않았다.
foreignData.name: 불길한 스핑크스
foreignData.text:
비행
당신이 카드를 순환하거나 버릴 때마다, 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -2/-0을 받는다.

foreignData.flavorText: As esfinges só começaram a falar depois que o Segundo Sol se alinhou. Elas sussurravam sinistros avisos, embora ninguém tenha ouvido.
foreignData.name: Esfinge Nefasta
foreignData.text:
Voar
Toda vez que você recicla ou descarta um card, a criatura alvo que um oponente controla recebe -2/-0 até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Сфинксы заговорили лишь тогда, когда Второе Солнце заняло свое место на небе. Они шептали зловещие пророчества, но их никто не слушал.
foreignData.name: Зловещий Сфинкс
foreignData.text:
Полет
Каждый раз, когда вы совершаете Цикл или сбрасываете карту, целевое существо под контролем оппонента получает -2/-0 до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 神日落位后，史芬斯才缓缓开口。他们低语严峻警告，但无人听闻。
foreignData.name: 恶兆史芬斯
foreignData.text:
飞行
每当你循环或弃一张牌时，目标由对手操控的生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。

foreignData.flavorText: 神日落位後，史芬斯才緩緩開口。他們低語嚴峻警告，但無人聽聞。
foreignData.name: 惡兆史芬斯
foreignData.text:
飛行
每當你循環或棄一張牌時，目標由對手操控的生物得-2/-0直到回合結束。

name: Ominous Sphinx
originalText:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard a card, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Some cards have an ability that triggers whenever you cycle any card. These triggered abilities resolve before you draw from the cycling ability.
An ability that triggers whenever you discard a card doesn’t give you permission to discard cards. You’ll need another effect that instructs or allows you to discard them.

An ability that triggers whenever you “cycle or discard” a card triggers only once if you cycle a card. The ability “Whenever you discard a card” is functionally identical to this ability; cycling is mentioned for clarity.

If a player discards a card during their cleanup step due to having too many cards in hand, any appropriate abilities that trigger on discarding that card trigger. If this happens, those triggered abilities are put onto the stack and players receive priority in that cleanup step to cast spells or activate abilities (normally, no players may take actions during a cleanup step). Another cleanup step is created following that one.

text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard a card, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
